short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Monitor the Bitcoin Best Metrics and learn the Counterflow strategy.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The BTC Ticker Extension offers users a Price Ticker and a powerful toolset for monitoring Bitcoin's key indicators, such as price, Fear & Greed, Dominance, Global Funding Rate, Avg. Fee and NUPL, empowering them to make more informed and rational investment decisions.

In addition, the extension includes a proven long-term investment strategy called the DCA CounterFlow. With this extension, users can take a "tortoise" approach to investing in Bitcoin, helping them stay focused on their long-term investment goals. 

These indicators show probable overbought and oversold regions based on market sentiment and metrics, assisting investors in their analysis in a rational and straightforward manner.

Overall, this extension is a must-have for anyone looking to get the most out of their Bitcoin investments and achieve a non stressful long-term success in this volatile market.
